patterns: How to select a stock for investment
What should we consider if we are buying stocks for the first time
What paramenters should we coonsider while purschasing a stock
responses:
Determine your investing goals 
1)Find companies you understand
2)Determine whether a company has a competitive advantage
3)Determine a fair price for the stock
4)Buy a stock with a margin of safety
